title: Emmerdale spoilers: Paddy takes action to stop Aaron breaking Robert free
text:
Aaron Dingle (Danny Miller) is as desperate as the rest of us to see Robert Sugden (Ryan Hawley) liberated in Emmerdale but he risks making the whole situation much worse tonight as he hatches a plot to try and break his husband out of prison.

It wouldn’t be the first time that he had been involved in such an endeavour as he and Cain (Jeff Hordley) managed to free Adam Barton (Adam Thomas) a couple of years back but can he really get so lucky twice? And can he and Robert truly face a life on the run?

Because of everything that Aaron stands to lose – including a normal life with sister Liv (Isobel Steele) and mum Chas (Lucy Pargeter) – Robert made the ultimate sacrifice and gave himself up to police, who arrested him for killing rapist Lee Posner.

But Aaron can’t face up to life without his soulmate and is not about to give up. Viewers have already seen him making a call to a contact to try and engineer a jailbreak but when Paddy Kirk (Dominic Brunt) gets wind of the shocking plan, he intervenes to stop Aaron throwing his life away.

As Paddy stands in his way and refuses to let Aaron out of the house, it remains to be seen whether he can stop Aaron doing something stupid. But it has already been confirmed that Robert will take the stand in court and be sentenced for his crime.

Fans are in bits as it is almost certainly the end of the road for the popular couple Robron, with Robert almost certainly set to be sent down for years. Danny Miller is sticking around in the soap as Aaron, who will hit rock bottom after losing Robert.

Emmerdale continues on Monday 21st October at 7pm on ITV.
